title: CSAV Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Argumentative Analysis and Writing Competencies at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic argumentative structures and writing experience
context.additional_context: Current practitioners with language-based job performance experience, in environments enabling smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can analyze argument structures (claims, evidence, counterarguments) in given texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners construct argument maps visually using the CSAV tool and achieve an average score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) from peer feedback.
Learners can apply structured argumentation patterns to write logically consistent texts aligned with the topic.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
